title: Johnny Depp Returning For New Movie With Al Pacino
description:
Fans were eager to know how Johnny Depp might return to his film career following his legal debacle with Amber Heard. As it turns out, Johnny Depp is coming back in a major way, pairing up with Al Pacino for a new movie. Interestingly, however, this isn’t just any movie. The upcoming film, titled Modi, [...]
